title: The Future of Work
description: Learn about the latest trends and developments in the world of work, and how they are shaping the future of employment.

title: Data Science for Everyone
description: Learn the basics of data science and how to use data to solve real-world problems.

title: The Art of Storytelling
description: Learn how to craft compelling stories that will engage your audience.

title: The Science of Happiness
description: Learn about the science behind happiness and how to cultivate more happiness in your own life.

title: The Psychology of Persuasion
description: Learn the principles of persuasion and how to use them to influence others.

title: The Future of Medicine
description: Explore the latest trends and developments in the world of medicine, and how they are shaping the future of healthcare.

title: The Business of Social Media
description: Learn how to use social media to grow your business and reach your target audience.

title: The Power of Creativity
description: Tap into your creativity and use it to solve problems and make a difference in the world.

title: The World of Artificial Intelligence
description: Explore the world of artificial intelligence and how it is changing our world.

title: The Future of Education
description: Explore the future of education and how technology is changing the way we learn.

title: Academic Decathlon
description: This competition tests students' knowledge in a variety of academic subjects, including math, science, history, and literature.

title: Math Club
description: Math Club provides students with an opportunity to explore their passion for mathematics.

title: National Honor Society Club
description: In the National Honor Society Club we recognize and honor students who have demonstrated a commitment to academic excellence, leadership, character, and service.

title: Quiz Bowl
description: This academic competition tests students' knowledge in a variety of subjects, including history, science, literature, and current events.

title: Science Fair
description: The perfect opportunity to showcase the student's original scientific research.

title: Words of the Champions
description: A university-wide spelling bee competition to test students' spelling and vocabulary skills.

title: Coding for Cool Kids
description: A kids-first course teaching the basics of coding in a fun and engaging way.

title: Design Thinking for the Digital Age
description: Learn how to use design thinking to solve problems and create innovative solutions.

title: Hackathon for Social Good
description: bringing together students, developers, and designers alike to learn, share and understand core concepts about hacking and how it can be used for a common good.

title: Leadership Lab
description: Teaching students the skills they need to be effective leaders.

title: Writing Your Way to Success
description: How to write clear, concise, and persuasive essays. A hands-on course about the importance of essays.

title: Robotics for Rocket Scientists
description: How to design and build robots. Build your own wall-e and learn core concepts about Robotics and Mechatronic designs.

title: Global Studies: A Worldly Perspective
description: University-wide discussion focused in exploring different cultures and perspectives from around the world.

title: Photography Exhibit
description: This exhibit will showcase the work of student photographers.
